Maven SVN Wagon

This maven wagon provides access to the Maven artifact repository hosted inside a Subversion repository.

The SVNKit library is used for all Subversion-related operations.

Usage

The wagon will allow to use the following kinds of URLs in the distributionManagement and repositories POM sections:

  • svn:http://host/path/to/repository
  • svn:https://host/path/to/repository
  • svn:svn://host/path/to/repository
  • svn:file://path/to/repository

The "svn:" prefix activates the wagon and the remaining part of the URL contains the proper Subversion repository URL.

For example:

<project>
    ...
    <distributionManagement>
        <repository>
            <id>your.server.id</id>
            <url>svn:https://your.server/path/to/repository</url>
        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>
    ...
</project>

Please note that if your Subversion repository can be accessed through the http or https protocol than you need this wagon only to deploy artifacts into the repository. If you depend on artifacts hosted inside such a repository than you can simply specify direct http or https repository URL in the repositories POM section.

The wagon should be added to your POM either as a dependency for the deploy plugin (if it is used in the deploy phase only) or as an extension (if it is used somewhere besides the deploy phase).

As the dependency for the deploy plugin:

<project>
    ...
    <build>
        <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
            <version><!-- please use the latest version of the deploy plugin --></version>
            <dependencies>
                <dependency>
                    <groupId>com.google.code.maven-svn-wagon</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-svn-wagon</artifactId>
                    <version>1.3</version>
                </dependency>
            </dependencies>
        </plugin>
    </build>
    ...
</project>

As the extension:

<project>
    ...
    <build>
        <extensions>
            <extension>
                <groupId>com.google.code.maven-svn-wagon</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-svn-wagon</artifactId>
                <version>1.3</version>
            </extension>
        </extensions>
    </build>
    ...
</project>

Features

The wagon uses the default Subversion runtime configuration area for evaluation of file properties (for example, svn:mime-type) that will be automatically set on newly added files.

Files ending with ".asc.md5" and ".asc.sha1" will be silently discarded on upload. Such files appear when the maven-gpg-plugin is used to sign the project artifacts and then the maven-deploy-plugin (either directly or through the maven-release-plugin) is used to deploy them to the repository.

Similar wagons

The following wagons can also be used to work with the Subversion-based Maven repositories:

  • org.apache.maven.wagon:wagon-scm
  • org.jvnet.wagon-svn:wagon-svn
